item.title: Deploy Windows Server with an Azure Free Account
item.description: Get an Azure Free Account Before you start, you will need to sign up for a free Azure account: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-au/free/ This gives you some Azure services, like Windows & Linux VMs, free for 12 months, while other Azure services (like Azure Active Directory) are free permanently up to certain usage limits. To see everything included in the free account, click here. Note: Don’t expect the server deployed under the free tier to be fast - we are limited to 1GB RAM and 1 vCPU with the B1s instance size.
